abstract: Letter from Pedro R Pierluisi, Puerto Rico's sole delegate in Congress, comments on July 14 Op-Ed article by Rafael Matos that called for referendum on statehood or autonomy for territory.
lead_paragraph: The island’s congressional delegate writes that “it is up to Puerto Rico to follow the path that Congress has set out.”
snippet: The island’s congressional delegate writes that “it is up to Puerto Rico to follow the path that Congress has set out.”...
